00008 #ifndef TRSL_PPFILTER_ITERATOR_HPP
00009 #define TRSL_PPFILTER_ITERATOR_HPP
00010 
00011 #include <trsl/error_handling.hpp>
00012 #include <trsl/common.hpp>
00013 
00014 #include <trsl/reorder_iterator.hpp>
00015 #include <trsl/random_permutation_iterator.hpp>
00016 #include <trsl/persistent_filter_iterator.hpp>
00017 
00018 namespace trsl
00019 {
00020   template<class Predicate, class ElementIterator>
00021   class ppfilter_iterator;
00022   
00023   namespace detail
00024   {
00026     template<class Predicate, class ElementIterator>
00027     struct ppfilter_iterator_base
00028     {
00029       typedef Predicate predicate_t;
00030       typedef ElementIterator element_iterator;
00031     
00032       typedef reorder_iterator<ElementIterator> upstream_iterator;
00033       typedef persistent_filter_iterator<
00034         Predicate, upstream_iterator> downstream_iterator;
00035     
00036       typedef boost::iterator_adaptor< 
00037         ppfilter_iterator<Predicate, ElementIterator>,
00038         downstream_iterator,
00039         typename boost::detail::iterator_traits<ElementIterator>::value_type,
00040         boost::forward_traversal_tag,
00041         typename boost::detail::iterator_traits<ElementIterator>::reference
00042       > type;
00043     };
00044   }
00045   
00046   
00057   template<class Predicate, class ElementIterator>
00058   class ppfilter_iterator
00059     : public detail::ppfilter_iterator_base<Predicate, ElementIterator>::type
00060   {
00061     typedef detail::ppfilter_iterator_base<Predicate, ElementIterator> base_t;
00062     typedef typename base_t::type super_t;
00063 
00064     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00065     
00066     typedef typename base_t::upstream_iterator upstream_iterator;
00067     typedef typename base_t::downstream_iterator downstream_iterator;
00068 
00069   public:
00070     
00071     typedef typename base_t::element_iterator element_iterator;
00072 
00073     ppfilter_iterator() :
00074       super_t(), predicate_()
00075       {}
00076       
00080     explicit ppfilter_iterator(Predicate f,
00081                                ElementIterator first, ElementIterator last)
00082       : super_t(), predicate_(f)
00083       {
00084         upstream_iterator ui = random_permutation_iterator(first, last);
00085         this->base_reference() = downstream_iterator(f, ui.begin(), ui.end());
00086       }
00087     
00097     template<class OtherElementIterator>
00098     ppfilter_iterator
00099     (ppfilter_iterator<Predicate, OtherElementIterator> const& r,
00100      typename boost::enable_if_convertible<OtherElementIterator, ElementIterator>::type* = 0) :
00101       super_t(r.base()), predicate_(r.predicate_)
00102       {}
00103 
00108     ppfilter_iterator<Predicate, ElementIterator> begin() const
00109       {
00110         ppfilter_iterator<Predicate, ElementIterator> i(*this);
00111         i.base_reference() =
00112           downstream_iterator(predicate_,
00113                               this->base_reference().base().begin(),
00114                               this->base_reference().base().end());
00115         return i;
00116       }
00117     
00122     ppfilter_iterator<Predicate, ElementIterator> end() const
00123       {
00124         ppfilter_iterator<Predicate, ElementIterator> i(*this);
00125         i.base_reference() = downstream_iterator(predicate_,
00126                                                  this->base_reference().base().end(),
00127                                                  this->base_reference().base().end());
00128         return i;
00129       }
00130     
00135     typename upstream_iterator::index_t index() const
00136     { return this->base().base().index(); }
00137 
00141     Predicate predicate() const { return this->base_reference().predicate(); }
00142 
00143   private:
00144     
00145 #ifndef BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00146     template <class, class> friend class ppfilter_iterator;
00147 #else
00148   public:
00149 #endif
00150     // Need to store the predicate to implement begin().
00151     // Else, a predicate_.reset() method would be required.
00152     Predicate predicate_;
00153   };
00154   
00155 } // namespace trsl
00156 
00157 #endif // include guard
